p: RAW 264.7 (mouse leukemic monocyte macrophage) cell line and HeLa cells were cultured in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM; Biowest, Nuaillé, France) containing antibiotics (100 IU/mL penicillin and 100 µg/mL streptomycin) and 10% heat-inactivated fetal bovine serum (Biowest, Nuaillé, France) at 37 °C under 5% CO 2/95% air atmosphere. In all experiments, cells were grown until more than 90% confluent and subjected to no more than 20 passages.
